content: Tzipora Halevi's Home Page This page: Contact | Research | Publications | Teaching | Resume | Tzipora Halevi Assistant Professor Computer and Information Science Brooklyn College Contact mailing address: Computer and Information Science Brooklyn college, 2900 Bedford Avenue, Brooklyn, NY 11210 office: Brooklyn College: 2156A Ingersal Hall CUNY Graduate Center: room 4327, 365 5th Ave, New York email: halevi AT sci DOT brooklyn DOT cuny DOT edu Research Interests: Security, blockchain technology, privacy, human-computer interaction and usability, embedded systems and signal processing Publications: See Publications on Google Scholar Teaching CISC3310   Principles of Computer Architecture CISC3620   Computer Graphics CISC1003 Explore Robotics
